name: pidgeotite
effect: Held: Allows Pidgeot to Mega Evolve into Mega Pidgeot.
short_effect: Held: Allows Pidgeot to Mega Evolve into Mega Pidgeot.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Pidgeot hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
